flyout.checkLatestFeatures: Check out our latest security features

aboutUs.title: Securing the Intelligent Future
aboutUs.subtitle: Aynigma Security Solutions Corp is a cybersecurity and AI defense company safeguarding intelligent systems across Saudi Arabia and beyond.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.content:
Aynigma Security Solutions Corp was founded to protect the next generation of intelligent technologies — from AI-driven platforms to critical national infrastructure. With headquarters in Saudi Arabia and the United States, we combine international expertise with local commitment to build trust in AI and digital transformation.

Our mission is to make AI systems secure, ethical, and compliant by design. We work alongside enterprises, governments, and innovators to ensure that every digital interaction — from a chatbot to a national data platform — operates safely and transparently.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading force in AI and cybersecurity innovation across the Middle East, empowering secure digital transformation in alignment with Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
items: Integrity: We build solutions that prioritize trust and transparency.
Innovation: We use AI to defend AI — combining creativity with precision.
Compliance: We uphold the highest standards of NCA, PDPL, and global regulations.
Collaboration: We partner with government, academia, and industry to advance national resilience.

differentiators.title: Key Differentiators
items: Dual presence in the U.S. and Saudi Arabia for global best practices and local compliance.
Expertise in both cybersecurity and AI model protection.
Alignment with Vision 2030's digital economy goals.
Active contributor to Saudi's growing AI and cyber innovation ecosystem.

aboutUs.ctaTitle: Partner with Aynigma to secure the foundation of tomorrow's intelligent systems.
aboutUs.ctaSubtitle: Join us in building a safer, more trustworthy AI ecosystem.

solutions.title: AI Security,
solutions.description: The rise of Generative AI brings enormous opportunity—and unprecedented risks. We deliver a complete platform to test, monitor, and defend your AI systems.

redTeaming.title: Expose AI Weaknesses Before Attackers Do
redTeaming.subtitle: Simulate real-world adversarial attacks to uncover hidden vulnerabilities across your AI models, pipelines, and agents.
redTeaming.challengeContent: AI systems are uniquely exposed — from prompt injection to data leakage and model inversion. Without adversarial testing, even the most advanced LLMs and AI workflows can be manipulated or exfiltrated.
redTeaming.solutionContent: Aynigma's AI Red Teaming delivers structured, repeatable, and customizable adversarial testing to reveal vulnerabilities before they become breaches. Using both automated and human-in-the-loop probes, we assess how your AI systems respond to malicious intent, policy evasion, and unauthorized data extraction.

attacks.title: Simulated Attacks
attacks.description: Simulated attacks aligned with OWASP Top 10 for LLMs

probes.title: Customizable Probes
probes.description: Customizable probe policies for prompt injection, data leakage, and jailbreaks

scoring.title: Automated Scoring
scoring.description: Automated scoring of model resilience and defense coverage

vulnerability.description: Identify and close exploitable AI vulnerabilities early

trust.title: Enhanced Trust
trust.description: Strengthen model trust, compliance, and brand reputation

regulatory.title: Regulatory Support

cost.title: Cost Reduction
cost.description: Reduce time and cost of post-deployment incident remediation

redTeaming.ctaTitle: Run adversarial simulations before your attackers do.
redTeaming.ctaSubtitle: Contact Aynigma to schedule a Red Team assessment.

runtimeProtection.title: Real-Time Defense for Intelligent Systems
runtimeProtection.subtitle: Monitor, detect, and contain malicious or abnormal behavior during live AI operations.
runtimeProtection.challengeContent: Once deployed, AI models face continuous threats — from input manipulation and data exfiltration to malicious retraining attempts. Static testing is not enough; runtime visibility is essential.
runtimeProtection.solutionContent: Aynigma's AI Runtime Security continuously monitors model behavior, user interactions, and inference outputs to detect real-time threats. Our system integrates with your SOC and SIEM tools to isolate compromised sessions and enforce policy-level guardrails automatically.

runtimeProtection.ctaTitle: Protect your AI models at runtime.

agenticSecurity.title: Secure the Next Generation of Autonomous Agents
agenticSecurity.subtitle: Detect and mitigate emerging risks in agentic and multi-AI systems before they act beyond intent.
agenticSecurity.challengeContent: AI agents capable of autonomous decision-making can execute unintended or unsafe actions if manipulated or misaligned. Traditional security tools can't see or interpret agentic behavior.
agenticSecurity.solutionContent: Aynigma's AI Agentic Scanning evaluates the security posture of AI agents, copilots, and orchestration frameworks. It tracks chain-of-thought logic, behavioral drift, and unsafe API calls to ensure compliance and prevent rogue operations.

policy.description: Behavioral policy enforcement for AI agent frameworks

scanning.description: Continuous scanning for unsafe or unapproved actions

decision.description: Monitoring of agent collaboration and decision flow
